requirements: experience directly managing social media accounts
proven record of maintaining a web presence by building, maintaining and engaging active web-based/social media audiences to meet outreach and impact goals

key_responsibilities: drafting news releases, talking points, and op-eds
responding to press inquiries in a timely and appropriate manner
monitoring the news/social media platforms throughout the day
supervising the development of website and social media content
developing and implementing media, communications, and public relations strategies

Hill experience and familiarity with Ohio, especially Northeastern Ohio
ability to identify local and national press opportunities

key_responsibilities: reviewing, sorting, and responding to incoming constituent correspondence
assisting the Member and legislative staff as needed
management of the website and social media activities, including official Facebook and Twitter accounts
requirements: excellent oral and written communication skills

key_responsibilities: staffing the front office and greeting visitors
coordinating and executing flag and tour requests
reviewing, sorting and responding to constituent mail
helping with other projects as needed

strong writing, communication, and organizational skills
